bike.description: Platinum Series 6066 butted & hydroformed aluminum, cold-forged dropouts, G2 29" Geometry

components.description: Fox F80RL 29, 80mm travel, custom G2 Geometry 51mm offset crown, air spring, external rebound & lockout
Bontrager Rhythm Comp Disc 29, 28mm wide tubeless ready* rims
Bontrager XDX, 29x2.1 (53/51), tubeless ready, abrasion resistant,120 TPI aramid folding bead
Bontrager Race Lite, superlight hollow cromoly rails
Bontrager Race Lite, 2014 aluminum shaft, infinite adjust Bontrager head
Bontrager Race Lite Big Sweep, 640mm width, 12d backsweep, 31.8mm
Bontrager Race X Lite OS, 7d rise, 31.8mm
Cane Creek ZS3, semi-integrated, cartridge bearings, short top cap
Avid Juicy 5, hydraulic disc, 160mm G2 Clean Sweep 6-bolt rotors
